sense.gloss: to stir, to churn, to poke (a fire), to disturb (water)
to throw into confusion, to throw into chaos, to disturb

sdata.j: ↑鳥↑↓とり↓が↑土↑↓ど↓を|かき↑回↑↓まわ↓す|。
↑遅↑↓おく↓れてきといて、↑話↑↓はなし↓を|かき↑回↑↓まわ↓す|のはやめてよ。
sdata.e: Stop showing up late and disrupting the conversation.

sdata.j: ↑熱↑↓あつ↓いから、↑湯↑↓ゆ↓を|かき↑回↑↓まわ↓す|のはやめて。
sdata.e: The water is hot, so stop stirring it.
